A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Aside from a specific side plot and some lines meant to be funny\, this movie is great. It pushes the franchise in a new and exciting direction that makes me so eager for what's about to come\, specially from Rian Johnson. Rey is not so bland anymore\, Kylo Ren is still a conflicted villain and Adam Drives gives an amazing performance just like Mark Hamill\, Carrie Fisher. The action sequences are no doubt the best in the whole franchise. Don;t expect an Empire rehash\, this movie is not it.
